website_summaries.verdict: While they have gorgeous color combinations, their other qualities can't quite compare to others on our list.
pros: Handcrafted and not tested on animals
cons: The scents are too light for some users, and the fizzy action isn't very strong
They don't contain essential oils, but have an oily residue

customer_reviews.title: Horrible, waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I am VERY disappointed with this product. They do NOT come individually wrapped and tied with a ribbon, that is a lie. I went with this ones because I was going to gift them and they looked presentable and ready to gift but that is NOT what I received, instead they come in a cardboard box wrapped in plastic with a piece of paper glued to them. They look super cheap!!! I would be embarrassed to give them as a gift and I would have to spend in individual bags and ribbons if I were to gift them... I don't have the option to send them back because they aren't eligible for return. What a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Raul H.

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice. They come packaged in a cute little box, all individually wrapped and tied with a ribbon. The three with a lot of color in them are pigmented in water, where as the others with more white obviously are not. Each makes bath water soothing and relaxing and they leave your skin feeling very soft. I think $26 is a good deal for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: Alena Majarian

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price, but not a Lush substitute
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these on seeing a comparison that they were like Lush bath bombs. While they are not of that level of quality and 'wow' factor, I was happy enough with them for the price. The oils in the bath bombs feel nice while you are in the bath and as other reviewers mentioned the scent stays on your skin long after the bath. Downside so far after trying one has been the rose petal pieces. They left quite a mess in the tub and looked more like vomit chunks than rose petals. :(
customer_reviews.author: T. Turchin

customer_reviews.title: The Lush ones came in a beautiful holiday box but each one looked very pale and ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased a box of Lush bath bombs as requested by my daughter. At the same time I also ordered the Oliver Rocket bombs. The Lush ones came in a beautiful holiday box but each one looked very pale and were not individually wrapped and all were broken. Oliver Rocket bombs were beautiful, wrapped individually and tied with a ribbon. They smell great, saving the last star for trying them out. Thanks for saving Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product, forget the size.
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant at first as I am used to Lush bath bombs. And they are a lot bigger, so I wasn’t sure if these would actually fill the whole tub full of goodness. I was wrong. These are great. We no longer have a Lush store in my town and I would have a 90 minute drive to get to one. Now I can get these sent straight to my house with a click of a mouse. Plus they are cheaper. Super bonus.
customer_reviews.author: scrapbook fan

customer_reviews.title: Meh scent, good everything else
customer_reviews.text: For the price these are good. Maybe my set just sat together for a long time, but they all smelled the same really. Not like any one bath bomb in particular just all the same combination of scents. In the tub they were a bit more distinct, but still a little weak in fragrance. However, they certainly softened my skin and the colors were pleasant. Heads up! Literally: You'll need to wash your hair separate if you fully submerge, these really cling to the hair.
customer_reviews.author: Mannequin

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous and indulgent!
customer_reviews.text: Obsessed! Came across these when looking for a Lush alternative. I've never tried Lush bath bombs (too pricey) and now I don't have to. I bought one for myself and one as a Christmas gift. Ending up giving some of my own away and am ready to buy another set. They smell so amazing and leave my skin incredibly soft. Love the natural ingredients too. The fact that I'm supporting small business is another plus. I am always hesitant to try new bath products due to the risk of infection down below (eek!) but I've had zero issues with these beauties.
customer_reviews.author: HEATHER FRALEY

customer_reviews.title: This stuffs are amazing smell and feel after soak in a hot bath
customer_reviews.text: This stuffs are amazing smell and feel after soak in a hot bath. I can smell and feel the oil was absorbing in my skin. Super fun colors and cute box. Abosutely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Bath Bombs are da bomb!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my niece (13 yr. old). Packaging was really nice, and cute! Great price for a 6 pack of bath bombs (and thank you for creating a variety pack)! Good quality and a GREAT alternative to LUSH bombs...the cucumber melon was the best followed by grapefruit tangerine...(get rid of moonlight rose, sorry grandma! and add more fruity fruit/candy anything please). My niece LOVED them and didn't even care that they weren't from LUSH so that alone was awesome! Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: SMSkane

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! Not buying any other bath bomb again.
customer_reviews.text: Love these! The scents are nice and not over powering of too manufactured smelling. They are just perfect! The fizz is an added bonus asbis the colors some of them turn the water (which does not stain the tub). Not only do I like them, but my son does as well. Its a great way to get him in the bath :) what is most important to me, and the original draw - is they are made in the USA. And now inknow how absolutely fabulous they are and won't buy any other brand!
customer_reviews.author: Allison Schanaman

customer_reviews.title: Very fragrant
customer_reviews.text: Really nice bath bombs. You can't hardly beat the price either for size of each one and how many you are getting. Came on time and very well packaged in a pretty pink box. They have a great fizzle and leave your water beautifully colored. The fragrance from these bombs seem to linger on my skin better and longer than other bombs but doesn't seem to make my skins QUITE as soft as another bomb I have tried. So if you are more interested in the aroma aspect these are for you. They really are great
customer_reviews.author: Misty Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Leaves the skin smooth and soft.
customer_reviews.text: Really good scents and leaves your skin feeling soft and smooth. Bought these as a gift for my wife and she liked them, with the exception of one. One of them when it dissolved left a large amount of particles floating in the water and did not dissolve completely. We ended up flushing the bathtub and using a different one. Otherwise it would be a five star review. Definitely not drying on the skin though, so that was a huge plus.
customer_reviews.author: Scotty

customer_reviews.title: VERY DISAPPOINTED(don’t buy this)
customer_reviews.text: I was going to give this as a gift. Before purchase,I looked some pictures in the review and read reviews.The wrapping in the pictures seemed good,so I purchased it. Then it came with THIS HORRIBLE WAY. Much space in box made with cardboard.And some big smears in the box too.Not like the wrapping(packing) I saw in the review.I was looking forward to this product,but now very disappointed and I can’t give this to people. This is a discriminatory treatment. P.S I used it instead of giving this to a person. It’s super OILY and GREASY. Now I’m relieved that I didn’t give this to person.
customer_reviews.author: Cloud

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product! I read a lot of reviews for other items and landed on this one by chance. It was a gift for my wife, and she absolutely loved it! These are larger than most of the other brands and I've seen it work first hand with all the fizzing and stuff, pretty cool! The smell is amazing, and they leave your skin feeling great! (Ya i tried it out :) I have since bought more! Not only is this the best for your money, I think it's just a great deal all around. Comes in the box shown.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Ok. Not great but not bad
customer_reviews.text: Ok. Not bad but not great. They don’t have super strong smell like other bath bombs I have tried. Personally I recommend skipping bath bombs all together and using epsom salt. It makes your skin softer and smells stronger if you get scented salt.
customer_reviews.author: Annalisa Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: They're a good alternative to Lush bath bombs, and the only ones I could find that were both natural and brightly colored. They don't effervesce for as long as the Lush balls, but are otherwise just as good, with a good mix of scents. My wife liked the whole set, which is nicely packaged and makes for a nice gift.
customer_reviews.author: Etteilla

customer_reviews.title: Great set for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great set for the price. I have thoroughly enjoyed all of the scents and I appreciate how the scent lingers not only on my skin, but in the bathroom as well. These bath bombs leave my skin feeling well hydrated but not oily, which is also a big plus. My only complaint is the coloring. Half of them, although they smell superb, lack color. The color, while not a requirement, is part of the fun. Two of them, that again smell fab, turn the water a sickly green color which reminded me of lake water. All that being said, I will definitely purchase these again. The pluses far outweigh the minuses!
customer_reviews.author: Hilarie Austin

customer_reviews.title: these bath bombs have been awesome. They smell great and make your skin feel ...
customer_reviews.text: So far, these bath bombs have been awesome. They smell great and make your skin feel incredibly soft. Highly recommend. The only thing is that there is one scent that smells like grandmas perfume, which, sorry, but gag... They should likely think about replacing the rose smell for something else. Otherwise, the other 5 smell great, and the soft skin after the bath is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: chuckd89

customer_reviews.title: A Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t used this product yet. It was a Christmas gift for my wife, but I’m sure she will love it. The box it came in is better than average and the bath bombs themselves have a very unique design to them, which we all know ladies like. I see no reason to tell you not to buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: bruce bass

customer_reviews.title: sorry NOT my cup of tea
customer_reviews.text: It was my first time using bath bomb and I hope they give moisturizing during a winter bath. The scent was so strong which does not seem to be a natural fragrant. I think we all know what strawberry, kiwi, melon or coconut smells. The box contains 6 different scents of bath bombs but to me they smell so artificial and not very pleasant to the respiratory system.
customer_reviews.author: ibuythings

customer_reviews.title: I really love these bath bombs
customer_reviews.text: I really love these bath bombs. They are pretty and were packaged nicely. They smell great and leave my skin soft. No mess in the tub either. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Karen D.

customer_reviews.title: Fun bath bombs
customer_reviews.text: These are nice bath bombs for the money. I loved the different scents and colors. The one down side was that the bath bombs dissolve quickly.
customer_reviews.author: sandra Christian

customer_reviews.title: Lovely!
customer_reviews.text: Colorful and pleasantly scented, functioning as bath bombs should. Shipping was great. Showed up in 2 days (free, no prime). Great for those whose impulse buys usually arrive after buyer's remorse sets in. Luckily, these dissolve (as does their packaging, assuming you have access to a burn barrel) so anyone looking to further my guilt will have to get close enough to smell me to prove anything.
customer_reviews.author: reginaldbirch

customer_reviews.title: The bomb
customer_reviews.text: These were a great gift set for my wife. It is a rare occurance for her to take a bath, but these are almost a relaxation treat for her to just hang out in the tub for a while. The scents are great, and she brags about how smooth her skin is for the next 2 days. This is the first time we've used a product like this, and it did not disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: uguana11

customer_reviews.title: Poor packaging
customer_reviews.text: Purchase was for a gift. The bath bombs looked and smelled great. My only issue was the packaging. The package was received with the bath bombs loose in the pink box, which looked poor, so I added crinkle paper to make it presentable. Also, the box was shipped just as is with the shipping label adhered to the box itself. Luckily the product did not break just a bit of loose powder.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best bath I've ever had!
customer_reviews.text: These bath bombs are amazing and all natural. They are very fragrant and leave your skin feeling smooth and soft. The scents linger on your skin for a couple of hours and best of all these don't leave stains in the tub like other products
customer_reviews.author: km

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: I love these bath bombs!! They are very large, and smell decent. Leave your skin feeling very soft. My daughter has eczema and sensitive skin, these do not bother her at all! These would be great as a gift, they come in the cutest box ever! I only wish they were a little more reasonable and comparable in price, little pricey.
customer_reviews.author: LISA

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE these. I first received them as a gift ...
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these. I first received them as a gift and once I used them all, I wanted to try a different brand. These are better than ALL of them. Only ones I’ve used that are as good are the Lush bath bombs. These are SO worth it. Won’t buy any others now!
customer_reviews.author: Tara S.

customer_reviews.title: These bath bombs are glorious! The scents are so ...
customer_reviews.text: These bath bombs are glorious! The scents are so relaxing and just the right strength- not too overbearing at all. The vibrancy of the colors impressed me as well, yet they didn't stain the tub. My skin feels incredibly soft and pampered after I use them. I used to splurge occasionally on Lush bath bombs, but to me these are much easier on the wallet and I see no difference in quality! Would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Koop

customer_reviews.title: I love these things
customer_reviews.text: I ended up buying these for my 8 year old daughter. I thought it would be something new for her, she's growing up. Each bath bombs had its own unique scent and once it went into the water, you smelled that scent throughout the house for the rest of the evening. When my daughter got up in the morning, you could still smell the deliciousness on her. I love these things. Will order more soon. Would love it if you guys can create more unique blends.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany robinson

customer_reviews.title: These are really great and big (most of the comparable bath bombs with ...
customer_reviews.text: These are really great and big (most of the comparable bath bombs with good reviews are about half the size of these). My GF loves these, as they are pretty, and also make her skin feel well moisturized and soft. I'll definitely buy them again :)
customer_reviews.author: Tomasz Przygoda

customer_reviews.title: Good Teenage Girl Gift Idea
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these as a birthday gift for my 14 year old cousin - very happy with her reaction, so seems like a good purchase. Smells were great on each bomb and the colors are unique. I was pleased with the packaging and overall appearance.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee

customer_reviews.title: the bath bombs themselves were far too fragrant for my taste and gave me a terrible headache. This I threw them out
customer_reviews.text: CUSTOMER SERVICE RATING : Personally, the bath bombs themselves were far too fragrant for my taste and gave me a terrible headache. This I threw them out. However, the company reached out to see how I liked them, I explained, and they offer me a concession. Wonderful customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Wurzel

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: I've never used a bath bomb before but I was pleasantly surprised by these. They're a nice size so they change the water very effectively. One of them turned the water a gross sewage brown-yellow colour, but it still smelt great so I can't complain. Overall, pretty good bombs at a fair price.
customer_reviews.author: Reid Marston

customer_reviews.title: The bomb!
customer_reviews.text: These bath bombs were nice. The scents were a bit too strong for my personal preferences, especially the midnight rose, but they did leave my skin feeling extra soft. The packaging was very pretty and the bombs themselves were also pretty. I liked that these were a lot bigger than most of the other bath bombs that you find online.
customer_reviews.author: Sandi

customer_reviews.title: Fun for you and the kids
customer_reviews.text: My son and I LOVE these. One smells just like the Cool Water cologne. They fizz nicely and all have a nice scent.
customer_reviews.author: suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Amazing bath bombs definitely a favorite!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a gift for Christmas last year; now she’s hooked on them. They’re a decent size, packaged well and overall you can tell the quality is put into the product they represent. I’ve ordered these bath bombs a few times over the year and some from different companies but always end up going back to this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph W Hiles

customer_reviews.title: Best Mother's Day gift!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first bath bomb purchase outside of Downtown Disney. I've always thought I couldn't find anything to compare near home. I bought these as a extra to the Mother's day gifts I sent out and our moms loved them. I tried the extra one out for myself and fell in love! They are beautifully wrapped and smell amazing! I'll order these again for my sisters!
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Fragrant and Moisturizing!
customer_reviews.text: These bath bombs are great! Very fragrant. I like that in a bath bomb, but if you like more subtle scent, it may not be the bomb for you. It colors the water nice colors. Very moisturizing. They tend to dissolve quickly, but that’s not really a pro or con for me. Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla B

customer_reviews.title: ... of bath bombs (including Lush) and these are my favorite by far
customer_reviews.text: (My wife)I've tried a few different brands of bath bombs (including Lush) and these are my favorite by far. They make my skin feel amazingly soft, leave no mess in the bathtub, and have just the right amount of smell. Only critique is that I wish there was a greater variety of scents to choose from (maybe some basic ones like honey, lemon, peppermint, etc) and I could do without the rose petals.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great birthday present
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my girlfriend as a gift and she loved them! We are both visual people so we were delighted with the packaging and branding, it's all really cute. The bath bombs smelled great, and I could recognize they were a good brand! That was a nice touch, really nice purchase, this is definitely a good gift
customer_reviews.author: Alex davila

customer_reviews.title: Great smell, silky smooth. Does not disappoint!
customer_reviews.text: These, are frickin amazing!! Great smell, silky soft. Totally in love. My new favorite. I even made a special list so I can buy more! Get these. You won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bath bombs gift set
customer_reviews.text: I have two daughter in laws who are soaking in the bathtub....both loved the bath bombs. I had given theirs to them before xmas as a "just because" gift BUT looks like I will be buying them again, since the bath bombs are at the top of both girls xmas gift list. They have amazing. great relaxing smells..and definitely large
customer_reviews.author: Gaely

customer_reviews.title: I liked 5 out of the 6 bombs
customer_reviews.text: I liked 5 out of the 6 bombs. One, which turned the water really blue, also contained little bits of flower petals or something. The squishy bits stayed behind when the tub drained and my husband thought they were bugs!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa E. McLoughlin

customer_reviews.title: Great scents!
customer_reviews.text: The bath bombs are huge! I liked the scents and presentation. You can give it on it’s own or split up the bombs individually, since they’re nicely wrapped. Still waiting on my family and friends to tell me how they were, since it’s not Christmas yet... I did buy two of these sets.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I can't justify the prices at lush, so I wanted to give these a try. They exceeded my expectations. It left my skin feeling so soft, the entire bathroom smelled lovely, and the bath water was just fun to look at. Definitely will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: angelina

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend these bath bombs!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these bath bombs...They smell great....they color the water, which makes the experience relaxing yet fun and clean up is easy.No stain in the tub..I`m on my second set and will purchase again!! Would make a great gift.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: They all smell very nice. However
customer_reviews.text: They all smell very nice. However, they dissolve faster than other bath bombs and the colors are kind of weird (yellow/green and yellow/orange are not appealing combos to take a bath in).
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Box a lil scary...
customer_reviews.text: Really liked these bath bombs. Just beware when ordering, there is no outer package. They are shipped in the box shown in pictures...and mine wasn’t even taped shut, so it could have opened at any moment. Other than the package, I loved the bath bombs. Great for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Neubauer

customer_reviews.title: These are the absolute best. Not only are the fizzy
customer_reviews.text: These are the absolute best. Not only are the fizzy, They contain oils to keep your skin soft. Also they are a large size. Just as good , if not better than Lush. They are also significantly less money. I don't think you can go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: They smell great and made my skin feel very soft
customer_reviews.text: I’m a sucker for all things “girly.” These were definitely worth the purchase. They smell great and made my skin feel very soft.
customer_reviews.author: Angeladm

customer_reviews.title: Will be purchasing these again
customer_reviews.text: Lovely. Packaging was cute, everything arrived as it should. No damage, no broken bombs. The scents are very strong. Only have used one so far, the blue one with real rose petals in it. That's the reason for the 4 stars- I actually didn't like how the petal pieces stuck to me lol. Otherwise, it fizzes and changes the color of the water. I still smelled like it the next day. Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Shaye R.

customer_reviews.title: Love these bath bombs!!
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered other bath bombs in the past, but these are superior by far. They have wonderful fragrances that last the entire bath. I love how they soften the water and leave my skin soft. Will definitely be buying these again!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: These are great! They make the bath water such a vibrant ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great! They make the bath water such a vibrant color and they smell wonderful. Also, they make your skin feel amazing after a good soak.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My favorite bath bombs are Lush. These are my second favorite and Waaaaaaaaay cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: Quality over quantity.
customer_reviews.text: My wife has tried 4 different brands (Several of the sets we tossed half the bombs due to quality). This brand was the best so far. The scents are personal preference, she loved them. Her skin was not only wonderfully soft, but seemed spa treated after. We both loved this.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Wash the play grime away with fun
customer_reviews.text: I bought two boxes for the children of nieces and nephews I was visiting. They loved them. The bombs helped get children into the bath after day long and evening games outdoors and on the trampoline. The 18 month old resists baths no matter how hot or muddy the day was. These are fun...a treat.
customer_reviews.author: Mary S.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Bath Bombs
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous display and wrapping. So pretty and smell great and moisturize. A fabulous gift or luxury to keep.
customer_reviews.author: Francesca  Malan

customer_reviews.title: YOU WILL LOVE THESE
customer_reviews.text: I LOVED these bath bombs!!! The first one I used smelled so amazing I didn't want to get out of the bath! My husband even loved the smell in the bed and bathroom from the bath water!! Beautifully packaged. Wonderful product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality for an amazing price!
customer_reviews.text: These bath bombs are truly amazing! Up until now I've been purchased or received them from the Lush store but will not longer do so. They're extremely fragrant and fizzle away in the water nicely leaving my skin very soft with the essential oils they're made with.
customer_reviews.author: Xiomy

customer_reviews.title: Emollient and soothing! Your skin will thank you!
customer_reviews.text: I love these bath bombs! I received them first as a Christmas gift from a dear friend. When I used the last one I found them on Amazon and reordered. The scents are lovely and the emollient oils are perfect. These are the most moisturizing bath bombs I’ve ever used.
customer_reviews.author: P. R. Baker

customer_reviews.title: They smell so amazing!
customer_reviews.text: These bath bombs are soooooo amazing! So far I've used the cucumber melon and I was so impressed! The smell is such a pleasant scent and really absorbs in your skin leaving you with a day long bath bomb scent. I really really recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Perla G

customer_reviews.title: A lovely gift! Quality bath bomb!
customer_reviews.text: What you see is what you get! A lovely set of organic quality made bath bombs. Made a great gift for my teenage daughter. She loves them.
customer_reviews.author: D.R.

customer_reviews.title: I ordered these for my wife on her birthday and she loved them the box was appealing and clean
customer_reviews.text: I am giving these bath bombs 4 stars on the note that I have not used them in a bath yet. I ordered these for my wife on her birthday and she loved them the box was appealing and clean. The bombs themselves smelled excellent, but two were cracked and it kind of ruined the joy of getting then because yes in the end it doesnt matter, but it made the product and me look bad. Once you get over that they are a great product. Would reccomend to buy, easily compared to lush in my eyes & at a cheaper price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What a Gift!!
customer_reviews.text: While I would love to experience even one of these luscious looking bath bombs it had taken great restraint to spare them for Christmas! My intention is to disperse them with Christmas presents to family and friends! I know they will be absolutely thrilled to soak up this luxury! Perhaps, if I am really good, I may just gift myself with some in the future! They are each beautifully wrapped and look amazing!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Smells wonderful and leaves your skin so silky smooth! The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is because they do not produce bubbles. When I hear bath bombs I assume bubbles are involved. However, great price for a great bath experience!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These smell divine and are packaged beautifully. I would probably be on prozac and giving ...
customer_reviews.text: These smell divine and are packaged beautifully. I would probably be on prozac and giving away my children if not for the knowledge these will greet me at the end of the day. Thank you Oliver Rocket!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Large and lovely
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my daughters birthday. They shipped quickly and arrived safely. No bath bomb was damaged in transit. They smelled lovely straight out of the box. They are very large and quite fragrant. My daughter used one last night and the entire bathroom was perfumed. She was very pleased. She has used bath bombs from Lush previously and said these were just as good. Very happy with purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly O

customer_reviews.title: My friend loved it
customer_reviews.text: bought as a gift for a friends birthday. She said they smelled really good and was packaged well. ill have to try them next
customer_reviews.author: JChambers

customer_reviews.title: Really nice not super tiny like others I saw online didn't ...
customer_reviews.text: Really nice not super tiny like others I saw online didn't stain the tub and the scent was amazing TREAT YOURSELF!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: very cool!!
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to find these online and I immediately bought them. They are such a reasonable price and they are quite big. I have only used one so far, but it smelled delightful and my skin was so smooth after my bath. I was also enthralled that actual rose petals came out of it while it was fizzing...very cool!!! I will be buying more as soon as I run out of the ones I have!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah E Healy

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for Mother's Day, the bath bombs were beautifully packaged--all I had to do was wrap the box. The bombs themselves were quite large, very colorful, and smelled heavenly. Thank you Oliver Rocket! Also really appreciated the follow-up email to check on my order...classy!
customer_reviews.author: Tamra

customer_reviews.title: Wish Lists work!
customer_reviews.text: My DIL had these on her wishlist, so it made it a bit easier for me to find a birthday gift for her. I don't know if she has used them before or not. They sure smell good!
customer_reviews.author: Christy Cutting

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for gift giving
customer_reviews.text: Very cute set of bath bombs in a pink case! Perfect for gift giving.
customer_reviews.author: Kit

customer_reviews.title: Bath Bombs, a great gift!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the bath bombs as a gift for my 16 year old niece. I am not familiar with bath bombs, but I was extremely pleased with the packaging, and the swiftness at which I received the product after ordering them. I would most definitely purchase them again.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Sneider

customer_reviews.title: Bath booms
customer_reviews.text: Love the bathbooms got them u two days my daughter order them before for my sister and thats who their for she trucks all month long and when she get to come home thats how she relaxes and love oliver rockerts bath booms the best way to go
customer_reviews.author: Annette C.

customer_reviews.title: Give yourself a Healthy Spa-Type Bath!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my sister who is a serious Bath taker; so this gift was perfect for her! Her reaction to opening this was "what are these"? and then she read the card w/all the ingredients in the bath bombs. She was quite impressed and thought it was a great gift!!
customer_reviews.author: The Pickle

customer_reviews.title: ... buy Bath bombs from Lush as they are my favorite splurge item to pamper myself with
customer_reviews.text: I usually buy Bath bombs from Lush as they are my favorite splurge item to pamper myself with! I am now obsessed with these bath bombs and will be buying them again and again! They would make a fantastic gift too! They are well made, amazingly scented, vibrantly colored and you can't beat the price! Splendid product and I am glad I tried them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Overall a nice product for the price. Not on the same level as Lush, if that is what you're expecting. The only reason for 4 stars is that sometimes the product felt excessivley oily on the skin... so much so that I would rinse off after a bath.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth De Guire

customer_reviews.title: Looks Nice, Smells Nice
customer_reviews.text: These are nice and big, about the size of a softball. Individually wrapped, and smell nice. I bought them as a gift for a friend, but I might have to buy another box for myself! Can't comment on "fizzyness" until then.
customer_reviews.author: S. Fine

customer_reviews.title: Hope they enjoy them. Very pretty
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as Valentine gifts for friends. Hope they enjoy them. Very pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Zana Niehues

customer_reviews.title: Great Lush alternative.
customer_reviews.text: Just getting around to trying these out and I must say they are a great alternative to my usual Lush bombs at a reasonable price !
customer_reviews.author: Cherish Humphreys

customer_reviews.title: My skin felt great after the soak
customer_reviews.text: I used the melon one and found that the smell was a bit overpowering. But the others are a bit more mellow and do not overpower the senses. My skin felt great after the soak. I did not get any hives (like previous post mentions) or even breakouts. The colors are awesome, too. Definitely worth getting over the overpriced LUSH products.
customer_reviews.author: Catniss

customer_reviews.title: Got these for my daughter for Christmas and placed in ...
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my daughter for Christmas and placed in her stocking. She loves them. She said the colors were vibrant.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn Marie D.

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a gift and the presentation is great. They look as they appear in the picture
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift and the presentation is great. They look as they appear in the picture. Also smell good. As I said, I bought if for a gift and she has not received them yet, so can not give rating on how well they work, but can update at a later time.
customer_reviews.author: Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Good price and presentation
customer_reviews.text: Ordered as a Christmas present. Good price and presentation. Look exactly like the picture. Very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So smooth and they smell good
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered from here twice. The scents are really pleasant, just kind of sweet and not at all artificial smelling or overpowering. I just used the black raspberry vanilla the other day and it smelled so. good. And when I was finished my skin was super moisturized and smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are the BEST bath bombs. I wish you could buy them individually. They smell so good and the scent really lasts. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Eileen Hambrick

customer_reviews.title: My 7 year old daughter really loves the colors and ...
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old daughter really loves the colors and the scents. Delivered just as promised. I will most definitely purchase more.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Curtis Gregory

customer_reviews.title: She loves the way it fizzes up and it smells awesome too.
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift to my girlfriend. She loves the way it fizzes up and it smells awesome too.
customer_reviews.author: Saugat

customer_reviews.title: Smells and feels wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I love these bath bombs. They are packed with wonderful smells and leave you skin feeling so soft and smooth. I will definitely be purchasing these again.
customer_reviews.author: loves her books

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Was just like lush everyday in my bathroom can't get any better
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: They fizzle and smell nice, but each one produces only one color as ...
customer_reviews.text: They fizzle and smell nice, but each one produces only one color as it fizzes. Additionally, it drops to the bottom of the tub and does not float while fizzing like Lush Bath Bombs.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: smells like urinal cakes
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed in these, the scent was very old lady and two of them smelled like public bathroom soap
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Lanciano

customer_reviews.title: ... one out for the first time and it was AMAZING!!
customer_reviews.text: I tried one out for the first time and it was AMAZING!!! I highly recommend it, the oils made my skin so soft. I used a cucmber melon and the smell is wonderful not too over powering but just right. These are my new favorite bath bombs and I will definitely be buying them again!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Ojeda

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality!
customer_reviews.text: Great bath bomb pack, each one was great. Nice quality!
customer_reviews.author: Emma Case

customer_reviews.title: I like them
customer_reviews.text: These bath bombs are great! I love the smell and color. They do dissolve rather quickly and one of mine had come apart a bit in its package, but those are rather inconsequential when it comes to my enjoyment of the bombs. Great stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Grace

customer_reviews.title: Treat yourself with these bath  treats!
customer_reviews.text: Baths are the best and these take it up a notch- love the bubbles, the fragrance and the silky way my skin feels. If money were no option I'd order a box weekly- but alas, the California drought will keep my love of baths in check-a great treat and a great gift-
customer_reviews.author: N Reilley

customer_reviews.title: They smell amazing! Almost good enough to eat
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a gift, but I did take a peek at them before wrapping them up. They smell amazing! Almost good enough to eat. They are fairly large, maybe even a bit larger than the lush bath bombs. They are individually wrapped and came in a cute pink box. I wanted to buy another box to use as stocking stuffers, but they were sold out! Definitely buying these again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my roommate; they smell amazing and are very well made! I’m super happy with my purchase... now I just need to get a set for me!
customer_reviews.author: TessAlice

product_meta.title: Oliver Rocket Bath Bomb Set, Extra Large 4.5 ounces per Bath Fizzy (Set of 6)
feature_bullets: BATH BOMB GIFT SET - A great mixture of fizzy, fragrant and soothing scents for a delightful bath experience - Makes a great gift
SIX COLORFUL BATH FIZZIES - Lavender, Cucumber Melon, Moonlight Rose, Grapefruit Tangerine, Black Raspberry Vanilla and Cool Water
HANDMADE IN THE USA - Every bath bomb is individually wrapped to preserve freshness and are handmade in the USA
EXTRA LARGE 4.5 OZ - Each aromatherapy bath bomb is 4.5 ounces for a long lasting, fizzy luxury bath experience
HIGH QUALITY INGREDIENTS - Our bath bombs contain the finest ingredients including baking soda, citric acid, kosher sea salt, water, shea butter, coconut oil, colorant and fragrance
